segments.text: May I speak to Mrs . Liu , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , good morning , Mrs . Liu . I'm calling to see if you have received my resume that I sent to you by Email .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Steven . May I ask whether I can have an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . In my opinion , you are the strongest candidate for the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When is it most convenient for me to visit you to talk about the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to set up an interview for you at 9 a . m . next Monday in our company's conference room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . See you then .
segments.speaker: S1
